A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not quite sure why the large gap exists between critics and regular moviegoers\, but I thought Episode VIII was excellent. I suppose to a purist\, the Luke Skywalker story in this particular film is not ideal\, but it's time to step out of the stone age and into 21st century cinema. The franchise is setup for many years to come\, and that can't happen with aging characters.
